sourcesContent:
<template>
  Home
</template>

<script>

import {inject, onMounted, onUnmounted, ref} from "vue";

export default {
  name: "Home",

  setup: function () {
    let mqtt = null
    const mqttClient = inject('mqttClient')

    onMounted(() => {
      mqttClient
          .then((client) => {
            client.on('connect', () => {
              mqtt = client
              test(client)
            })

          })
          .catch((err) => {
            console.log(err)
          });
    })

    /**
     * Execute when unmounted and mqtt variable is assigned and the mqtt.value is undefined (ref
     */
    onUnmounted(()=> {
      if(mqtt){
        console.log("unmounted")
        mqtt = null
      }
    })

    const test = (client) => {
      client.subscribe('test')
      client.publish('test', 'lol')
    }

  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
